Schenectady.WGY (AM): WGY (AM 810, 103.1 FM, NewsRadio WGY) is a radio station licensed to Schenectady, New York, and owned by iHeartMedia, broadcasting a news and conservative talk radio format. It broadcasts 50,000 Watts non-directional from a single tower in the Town of Rotterdam. It is one of the United States' oldest radio stations as well as the oldest in New York's Capital Region.
